briefTitle: Gated Radiotherapy in Left Sided Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: A Prospective Study on the Need of Gated (GAT) Radiotherapy in Left Sided Breast Cancer Patients Treated at the Technical University Munich (TUM) - the GATTUM Protocol
conditions: Breast Neoplasm Female, Radiotherapy Side Effect, Heart Diseases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Measurement of distance from chestwall to the heart
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* left sided breast cancer patients treated with breast conserving surgery

* patients treated with mastectomy
